overview: Love story between Charlotte & Lou and her physical / mental reconstruction after a traffic accident. Charlotte will come back to life through love, her passion for dance, but also through sex, with the help of a sex worker dedicated to supporting people with disabilities Following her separation, Lou, a reserved young woman, rents out a room in her oversized apartment, which she struggles to take on alone. During one of her dance lessons, she will meet Charlotte, a photographer, looking for a new place to live. After her installation, Lou will quickly be troubled by Charlotte, as much by her attitude, deliberately casual and liberated, as by her beauty and her charisma. Thus begins a passionate and passionate story between the two women which will allow Lou to explore new sensations, new experiences, shattering the limits which were hers until then.
title: Vivante
